mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_hotgoods (hotgoods_id, goods_id, hotgoods_sort, is_deleted, create_by, gmt_create, last_modified_by, gmt_modified, version) values (#{hotgoodsId}, #{goodsId}, #{hotgoodsSort}, 0, #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_sys_hotgoods where is_deleted = 0 and (hotgoods_sort = #{hotgoodsSort} or goods_id = #{goodsId})
select count(*) from t_sys_hotgoods where is_deleted = 0 and hotgoods_id != #{hotgoodsId} and (hotgoods_sort = #{hotgoodsSort} or goods_id = #{goodsId})
mapper.update: update t_sys_hotgoods set goods_id = #{goodsId}, hotgoods_sort = #{hotgoodsSort}, version = version + 1 where version = #{version} and hotgoods_id = #{hotgoodsId}
